    Class
    Description
    class 
    NoRequirementsErrorMessage
    Message sent by the server to the client to notify that the requirements, when trying to place a face are not met.
    class 
    NumberPlayersWrongErrorMessage
    Message sent by the server to the client to notify that the number of players is wrong.
    class 
    PlayerDisconnectedMessage
    Message sent by the server to the client to notify that one player has disconnected and therefore the game ends.
    class 
    SendAvailableColorsMessage
    Message sent by the server to the client to send the available colors to the client
    class 
    SendAvailablePositionMessage
    Message sent by the server to the client to send the available positions to the client
    class 
    SendPossibleGoalsMessage
    Message sent by the server to the client to send the possible goals to choose from
    class 
    SendWinnerMessage
    Message sent by the server to the client to send the winner(s) of the game
